title: Dev Blog: Defining the Rift’s Visual Style

replies.body: Now that the summoners rift is updated my {{champion:112}} - {{champion:11}}  will be {{champion:86}} teed
Yup, this update is gonna be {{champion:150}} {{champion:64}}
{{champion:34}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:64}}
What?
Egg,Zac,Lee.

took 5 min to decypher...
*then scrolls down*
oh crap
Hahah Nice.
IT WILL ELIMINATE TOASTERS no more 20 minute load screens
i think it might evolve toasters into potatoes {{summoner:3}}

Oh. Hi
So. How are you holding up?
BECAUSE I'M A POTATO
[clap clap clap]
Oh, good. My slow clap processor made it into this thing. So we have that.
Gave me a good chuckle. Thanks for reminding me of that scene in Portal
well done
{{champion:27}} https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uJ9G0PuK_4M {{champion:27}}

lol, again?
Singed playz = best playz
I really dislike how league looks now its drives me away from playing

i logged in to upvote this.  Part of the fun was the champions being kinda cartoony, now they get rid of fun things like gp ult and ruined art on like half their champs now. its gonna look more and morelike star craft and warcraft i guess
if you want cartoony, go play adventuretime battle party
logged in to upvote Xynorph because they made me giggle {{champion:154}}
Logged in specifically to downvote FatStax and Vinnum, and upvote Xynorph.
Rip all the campfires? How do the jungle mobs keep warm?
Well half of them are rocks...
{{champion:54}} {{item:3070}}
It's always sunny in the north jungle
i feel like {{champion:34}}  gets no attention. who do you think gets no attention,

1. {{champion:90}}  the reason why I said Malzahar gets no attention is because his skins are just messed up like they only changed the way he looks. Spells still the same, voidlings are the same. Like they don't care about this champ. All his skins are repeats except Overload. Thats just in my opinion
pool party plz. i need my crablings

Bee Keeper Malz? Voidlings have wings and little stingers on their butts and all of his abilities have their "Void" effects replaced with bees! Q summons bee hives on both sides that bees fly out of and then into the opposite hive. Ofcourse W is honey :D

The ult would be hilarious. Channeled stream of bees directly into the target's face xD

Oh and the voidlings need to have some sort of stinging animation.

NOT THE BEES! NOT THE BEES! ARGHGHGHGHGHGHGH

*An enemy has been slain*
I love this idea, but I also saw a skin idea for "Bee Keeper Singed" that I love even more, where his gas is replaced with bees as he runs all over the place.  It made me laugh so much.
i didn't know i needed this. flying voidlings would be scary. flying voidlings with over 500 AD would be even scarier.
I've never played Malz, and i love this idea.

so {{champion:1}} throwing or {{champion:115}} throwing snow doesnt ?

and angel {{champion:110}} totally fits his revenge theme
Overloard {{champion:90}}  voidlings look sick what are you talking about
You do realize that all of malz's skins were made way back when riot didn't give custom animations to every skin they made, right?
{{champion:19}} hes one of the oldest champs in the game and my first champ i played and pretty much my jgl main i really would love if rito gave him some love

My 1st champ too... {{champion:19}} The reason why i started to play League in 2010... and now that almost every champions are up to date... my poor werewolf has been forgotten {{champion:19}} ...*cry* {{champion:19}} {{champion:19}}{{champion:19}}{{champion:19}}{{champion:19}}{{champion:19}}
{{champion:17}} because he doesn't deserve any

This makes so much more sense now as to how they are promoting toasters and even *increasing* fps for them. Taking away all the environmental clutter and replacing them with simpler items makes so much sense. 

Great job on explaining the visual hierarchy too, I'm not into the whole saturation vs values thing, but it still made sense to me and got the point across.

Love the painted style too by the way, so much cleaner and mystical looking than before. Two thumbs up!!

RIOT NEEDS AN ASSISTED IMPROVEMENT "SECTION" SIMILAR TO HOW YOU WOULD DO THE TUTORIALS ACCEPT ONE DEDICATED SPECIFICALLY TO PLAYERS IMPROVING THEIR GAME PLAY. KNOWLEDGE IN THIS SECTION COULD BE: ROLE SPECIFIC INFO., GENERAL MECHANICS INFO., WHAT TO DO AT SPECIFIC POINTS IN THE GAME, ECT. 

I gotta say I would love to see the community in NA improve as a whole especially for the people like myself new to the game treading water tying to improve but are stuck from a deficiency of specific knowledge, whatever it may be.

I agree completely, also I can almost garentee it would bring in a lot more players, only because they could have an understanding of how to play, opposed to randomly roaming the map and dying constantly and rage quitting, leading them to never play again. I assume that's a huge reason why half the new players quit is because they start out playing with no idea how to actually play, IMO the intro is useless and shares too little detail on how to actually play the game, maybe explain more into how the champs are played and what the skills do( kiting, damage/stun skills, and also combos)
This would be HUGE! not knowing how to play and getting dominated by kids who play as smurfs is the most frustrating thing in the world to me

so I am not seeing things and his ult is broken. I though it was weird when using his ult that it went right thru champs without pushing them back.
too bad {{champion:78}} still hasnt received a splash art update or a visual rework {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-update/dev-blog-champion-updates

Last paragraph.
Thank me later.

They understand there are a large number of old champions/skins that need reworking. The pool of work they have for cosmetic changes is endless as they progress old skins to new and others become increasingly obsolete during that time.
Riot where's smiley face on bot lane rock? It keeps me from not becoming depressed when i have to support.
